name: Viper F40
overview: A police investigation unfolds as detective Lilia and her freelancing friend Raika attempt to solve the mystery of three missing persons. Their investigation draws the ire of a small gang... This was the first Sogna game to be made available only in CD format, not in diskettes. The same media can be played on either PC-compatible or PC98 hardware but only while running Windows; earlier PC98 games were DOS based
